mapper.select: select u.phone , u.name , (select FLOOR ((sum(sh.qty))/10) from stamp_hist sh where sh.phone = u.phone ) as stamp , (select (sum(sh.qty)) % 10 from stamp_hist sh where sh.phone = u.phone ) as stamp2 , NVL((select (sum(ch.qty)) % 10 from coupon_hist ch where ch.phone = u.phone ),0) as coupon , u.remark from user u WHERE phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into user(phone, insertdt, updatedt) values (#{phone}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: select id from coupon_hist where phone = #{phone} order by insertdt limit #{count}
mapper.update: update user set stamp = stamp - 10, coupon = coupon + 1, updatedt = sysdate() where phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into stamp_hist(phone, qty, insertdt, updatedt) values (#{phone}, #{qty}, sysdate(), sysdate())
insert into coupon_hist(phone, qty, insertdt, updatedt) values (#{phone}, 1, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.delete: delete from stamp_hist where insertdt <= date_add(now(), interval -1 month)
delete from coupon_hist where insertdt <= date_add(now(), interval -1 month)
